t:template:
This is a template!
At first, let me present some raw values: The value of Integer.MAX_VALUE is Integer.MAX_VALUE, π has the value π, 0.99999999999999999999999999999999 is 0.99999999999999999999999999999999, and Long.MAX_VALUE is Long.MAX_VALUE.
Now some formatted numbers: e is an oddly formatted value of Euler's Number. 1234567890987654321 is a long value converted to text and 20% is 20% formatted with a number appender provided by the properties map under key numberAppender, while is a float value of a user-defined property formatted with a user-defined format stored in a property numberFormat.
